```{r}
clusters <- data_frame(points=c(1,2,3,4,5,6),
                       d8=as.numeric(c( 7.60615490e-04, 8.81908709e-04,-1.56654507e-03, 3.77986549e-03,-1.63674792e-03,-4.81345630e-04)),
                       d4=as.numeric(c(1.86674735e-05, -2.72863437e-03,-9.06914202e-03,1.02285896e-02, 2.31427145e-03, 2.56901917e-03)),
                       d3=as.numeric(c(-1.48133438e-03, - 1.76566835e-02,  -1.67195678e-02,  -1.02206745e-02, -1.87481255e-02, -7.42778303e-03)),
                       d2=as.numeric(c( 4.80471808e-02, 1.89865712e-02, 5.51073493e-02, 2.23686838e-02, 1.43890028e-02, 6.07876642e-03)),
                       d1=as.numeric(c(-1.13749846e-01, 5.48473256e-03, 4.34622091e-01, 2.74660413e-01,-4.63572014e-02, 1.14269692e-01)), 
                       d5=as.numeric(c(2.06638859e-03,-3.87265890e-04, 1.01578702e-02,-6.94434057e-03,-8.86661139e-04,-9.31756128e-04)),
                       d7=as.numeric(c(1.69428752e-03,-6.38068621e-04, 1.48049274e-02,-9.33937030e-03, 1.79049026e-04,-3.83044531e-03)),
                       d6=as.numeric(c( 2.88096926e-05, -2.97027559e-03,  6.14116840e-04,  2.33207017e-03,  3.14692892e-03, -7.87809028e-05)),
                       d9=as.numeric(c(9.11478978e-04,-1.31201233e-03,-2.25258870e-03, 8.62742511e-04, 7.19635940e-04, 1.50543228e-03)),
                       d10=as.numeric(c( 1.23790323e-03, 8.22313616e-04,-3.53520503e-03, 8.67177324e-04,-2.65875996e-03, 4.55303452e-03))) %>% 
  mutate_all(funs(rescale)) 

ggradar(filter(clusters, points==.0))+
  ggtitle("point1")
ggradar(filter(clusters, points==.2))+
  ggtitle("point2")
ggradar(filter(clusters, points==.4))+
  ggtitle("point3")
ggradar(filter(clusters, points==.6))+
  ggtitle("point4")
ggradar(filter(clusters, points==.8))+
  ggtitle("point5")
ggradar(filter(clusters, points==1))+
  ggtitle("point6")


ggradar(filter(clusters, points<=.0))
ggradar(filter(clusters, points<=.2))
ggradar(filter(clusters, points<=.4))
ggradar(filter(clusters, points<=.6))
ggradar(filter(clusters, points<=.8))
radar <- ggradar(filter(clusters, points<=1))+
  ggtitle("6 cluster centers in 10 dimensions")

#ggsave("clusterRadar.pdf",plot = radar)

```
